definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
erhua variant of 蛋卷[dan4 juan3]

sentences.english: The little boy is licking the ice - cream cone .
sentences.chinese: 小男孩在舔着冰淇淋蛋卷。

sentences.english: How about an omelette, or something?
sentences.chinese: 吃点煎蛋卷还是吃点别的？

sentences.english: There was soup, an omelette or something, coffee and light wine.
sentences.chinese: 有一道汤，一道蛋卷或别的什么菜，还有咖啡和淡酒。

sentences.english: Many children would rather eat ice cream from cones than from dishes.
sentences.chinese: 许多小孩喜欢吃蛋卷冰淇淋胜过盘装冰淇淋。

sentences.english: In Chinese cuisine, egg rolls differ from the spring roll.
sentences.chinese: 在中菜里，蛋卷与春卷不同。

sentences.english: Marianne slipped to the Concession Stand for an ice cream cone.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽安溜到商摊去买蛋卷冰激凌。

sentences.english: An egg-white spinach omelet with sliced avocado and some whole-grain toast will do the trick!
sentences.chinese: 蛋白菠菜蛋卷外加鳄梨片儿和全麦土司最好了。

sentences.english: One can also shape the brioche into a braid for special occasions.
sentences.chinese: 你同样可以在特殊场合下将奶油蛋卷做成麻花状。

sentences.english: Now that egg would make an enormous omelette.
sentences.chinese: 现在这颗蛋可以做一个巨大的煎蛋卷。

sentences.english: The mushroom omelet appealed to itself.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇煎蛋卷只为自己付帐。

sentences.english: And everyone knows that an omelette can be eaten at any meal.
sentences.chinese: 这就是大家所熟悉的，蛋卷可以与任何食物配餐来吃。

sentences.english: Sit down. How about an omelette, or something?
sentences.chinese: 坐下，吃点煎蛋卷还是吃点别的好吗？

sentences.english: My wife likes mushroom omelet and I want fried eggs sunny side up.
sentences.chinese: 我太太喜欢蘑菇蛋卷，我要单面煎蛋。

sentences.english: I'd like to have this stewed prunes and omelet, just plain.
sentences.chinese: 我要吃煮干梅子和纯煎蛋卷以及黄油面包。

sentences.english: It's saltier and more chewy than American omelets.
sentences.chinese: 这比美国蛋卷咸一些也更有嚼劲。

sentences.english: Wouldn't you like to finish up the omelette?
sentences.chinese: 你不想把煎蛋卷吃完吗？
